name: Marzipan Cookies
author: Anonymous
summary: If you love marzipan, you will love these cookies. They are super easy to make, but you need to make the dough ahead of time, as they need to dry overnight.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons rose water, or to taste
directions: Combine marzipan, confectioners' sugar, egg white, and flour in a bowl
Roll out to 1/3-inch thickness and cut into whatever shapes you like
Line a baking sheet with baking parchment and place cookies onto it
Allow to dry, 8 hours to overnight
Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Bake cookies in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 12 to 15 minutes
Transfer to a wire rack and let cool
Brush the cooled cookies with rose water
